description: Daniel's girlfriend thinks he needs therapy to modify his behavior but decides this little whore needs more then traditional therapy. She sends him to a dominatrix instead to whip him into shape! Tina expertly administers pain then bends this slut over invading his tight ass. Rest assured he will be a changed man! In the end she feels his session wouldn't be any fun if she didn't take him for a ride just for her own kicks. Of course this wicked dominatrix takes advantage of the opportunity!
title: Therapy
